IMAGiNE bringing you another release.....Grown Ups CAM 

First off many thanks to slugger and the TA crew for the source files 

Well firstly we cropped the borders and resized the video so we only got a 0.1% AR error.....then we cleaned up
the video,by changing the chroma,brightness,contrast,rgb colours,also used a smoother aswell.
The audio we left it untouched ,hence the AC3 192 audio......we never upscaled it,this is how the original audio was.
Yet again thanks to slugger and TA.

Enjoy
